alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 6:29PM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Collier. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 627 PM EDT, gauge reports indicated between 1.5 to 2 inches of rain had fallen in the area covered by the advisory. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naples Manor, East Naples, Lely Resort and Lely. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
